title: Lb has way too much damage in her kit for the amount of safety it also has
body:
Leblanc has the ability to be in FIVE places at once. Her clone, her current position, two dashes, and the two blinks she can go back to from each dash. That is absolutely way too much ground to cover to kill her. This amount of safety should not have a kit that allows you to press Q and literally any other ability to instant kill an adc. Did you know late game her Q has over 1400 damage alone? Yea that's fair.

Nerf the safety or nerf the damage, it's ridiculous
